set.name: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have at least one water creature and at least one darkness creature in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, they can't attack or block: ► Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Ten Kings Series Volume 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water 2.) ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a race and look at your opponent's hand. You may choose a card that has the chosen race from among it. If you do, your opponent discards that card and chooses one of their shields and puts it into their graveyard. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Jokers creatures cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.
